content.question: The force exerted by a non-linear spring is given by <math alttext="F of x equals negative k x raised to the four thirds power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>F</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mo>âˆ’</mo><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></msup></mstyle></math>. Which of the following expressions correctly models the potential energy stored in the spring when it is compressed a distance of <math alttext="D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>D</mi></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="one half k D squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>D</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="three sevenths k D raised to the seven thirds power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>7</mn></mfrac><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>D</mi><mfrac><mn>7</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></msup></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="one half k D raised to the eight thirds power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>D</mi><mfrac><mn>8</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></msup></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="four thirds k D raised to the one third power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>D</mi><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></msup></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="three sevenths k D raised to the seven thirds power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>7</mn></mfrac><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>D</mi><mfrac><mn>7</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></msup></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
